description:
This market refers to the LoL match between Hanwha Life Esports Challengers and DRX Challengers in the LCK Challengers League Kickoff Playoffs, scheduled for February 10 at 3:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Over" if Hanwha Life Esports Challengers and DRX Challengers play 4 or more games in this series.

If fewer than 4 games are played, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page.

events.description:
This market refers to the LoL match between Hanwha Life Esports Challengers and DRX Challengers in the LCK Challengers League Kickoff Playoffs, scheduled for February 10 at 3:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Hanwha Life Esports Challengers" if Hanwha Life Esports Challengers win the match against DRX Challengers.

This market will resolve to "DRX Challengers" if DRX Challengers win the match against Hanwha Life Esports Challengers.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page.
events.title: LoL: Hanwha Life Esports Challengers vs DRX Challengers (BO5) - LCK Challengers League Kickoff Playoffs

question: Games Total: O/U 3.5
